ing: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
1 green bell pepper, seeded and diced
1 (1 ounce) packet dry au jus mix
4 cups water, or amount to cover
n: Cyndee's Best Slow Cooker Italian Pot Roast
des: "My family loves roast beef so I kept messing around with my own recipe until I came up with this one.  My family says 'no more' trying to make the perfect roast.  This apparently is.  Serve with mashed potatoes and use the juices for gravy."
ins: Place the pot roast in a slow cooker. Add the onion, celery, red and green bell peppers, au jus mix, and enough water to cover the meat. Cover and cook on Low for 8 hours, or until tender.
